post.description: Can be use as ShippingAddress or BillingAddress
Usefull to store a document on Shippingbo before use it as an invoice, CN23, proforma invoice or dematerialized document
It allows to link an UploadedFile to an Order, then can be printed with the shipping label or send to the carrier in case of dematerialized documents

get.description: Returns main information of an Order
Returns main information of a Product

Address.title: Address
Address.description: Address object is used for billing and shipping address, must be created before create an order

order_item_attributes.description: When you create an OrderItem you have to remove the id from the object. The id will be returned by the API
